hero.title: [BOLD]Alpaca Chat[/BOLD][BREAK]AI chat for your site
hero.subtitle: Add an AI assistant that answers instantly using your own knowledge.

features.title: What Alpaca Chat Offers
features.subtitle: Give visitors instant, tailored answers that support faster decisions and free up your team.

items.title: On-Page Answers
items.description: Alpaca Chat reads the page your visitor is viewing and responds in context.

items.title: Your Knowledge Included
items.description: Upload your guides, policies, product info and Alpaca Chat blends them seamlessly for more accurate replies.

items.title: Setup in minutes
items.description: Install the WordPress plugin and style to match your branding, no coding required.

items.title: Personalized Responses
items.content: The assistant uses the content of the page the user is viewing and combines it with its knowledge of your products or services to provide appropriate assistance.

messages.text: I'm reading about your fitness programs. Which one would you suggest for someone new to working out?
For beginners, our 'Fit Start Program' is a great choice! It includes guided workouts, nutrition tips, and a 4-week plan to help you ease into fitness. Would you like me to help you sign up?

items.title: Instant Customer Support
items.content: Provide blazingly fast support, answer queries, and engage your visitors like never before with our intelligent AI assistant.

messages.text: Does the Alpine Adventure trip include any activities for families?

Yes, the trip includes family-friendly activities like easy hiking trails, a family picnic by a mountain lake, and a guided nature walk tailored for all ages. There’s also a kid-friendly treasure hunt on one of the stops. Would you like more details on these activities?

items.title: Turn Visitors Into Customers
items.content: Guide hesitant visitors through their buying journey with personalized recommendations and answers to their concerns. Help them make confident decisions that turn browsing into sales.

messages.text: Can you tell me more about your express shipping service?

Absolutely! Our express shipping service ensures your order is delivered within 1-2 business days. It’s available for all products and costs an additional $9.99. If you place your order before 3 PM, we’ll process it the same day. Would you like me to guide you through the checkout process?

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Website Experience?
cta.subtitle: Enter your email address to get the latest updates and be among the first to try Alpaca Chat and help shape the roadmap.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze our website’s performance. Please choose whether to accept or reject non-essential cookies.

snackbar.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage subscription and billing details for your account ({email})

signedOut.title: Get your own AI-powered chatbot
signedOut.subtitle: Sign up for an account to get your own AI-powered chatbot.

apiKey.title: Your API Key
apiKey.tooltip: Use this API key to authenticate your requests to the Alpaca Chat API. Keep it secure and don't share it publicly.

messages.noSubscription: No active subscription. Select a plan to get the API key.
messages.subscribeToGetKey: No active API key found. Subscribe to a paid plan to get your API key.

files.title: Your Files
files.tooltip: Manage your uploaded files that are used to train your AI chatbot. You can upload documents, delete them, and monitor their processing status.

counters.uploaded: {count, plural, =0 {files uploaded} one {file uploaded} other {files uploaded}}
counters.uploadedOld: {count, plural, =0 {0 files uploaded} one {# file uploaded} other {# files uploaded}}

empty.title: No files uploaded yet
empty.subtitle: Upload your first document to start training your AI chatbot

tooltips.subscriptionRequired: Active subscription required to upload files

errors.noVectorStore: No vector store found. Upload your first file to create one.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe from Our Emails
unsubscribe.subtitle: Enter your email address and we will remove it from our contact list.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.

chat.initialMessage: How can I help you today? You can ask me anything about the page or you can choose of the predefined personas.

initialAssistants.name: Gym Assistant
initialAssistants.initialMessage: Hello! I am an assistant for a fictional fitness studio. Need details on our workout programs, membership options, or opening hours? I'm here to help!
suggestions: What membership plans do you offer?
Which program is best for beginners?
What are your opening hours this week?

initialAssistants.name: Wristway Ergonomic Assistant
initialAssistants.initialMessage: Hello! I am the assistant for Wristway, a fictional ergonomic wrist rest designed to enhance comfort and productivity. Do you need information about Wristway's features, usage, or benefits? I'm here to help!
suggestions: How do I clean and maintain it?
Is Wristway compatible with my keyboard?

chat.errorMessage: I'm experiencing some technical difficulties. Please try again later.
